data.eml:eml: Review of the genus Carlschoenherria (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae) of the Philippines

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Calcetas, Orlando A. (2019): Review of the genus Carlschoenherria (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae) of the Philippines. Zootaxa 4619 (2): 330-346, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4619.2.8
